name: Hilton Head Flyers
about: Hilton Head Flyers, located on beautiful Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, offers superior quality flight training with a focus on safety and passion for aviation. Led by Bill Shank, an FAA Certified Flight Instructor (CFI/CFII) with over 40 years of flying experience and 7,000 hours in the air, the school provides comprehensive training in various aircraft, including Piper, Cessna, Mooney, and Bonanza. Bill, a former DOD educator trained by military instructors, has extensive international and domestic flying experience. The school uses state-of-the-art equipment, including Garmin 1000 glass cockpits and advanced flight simulators. Services include discovery flights, private and instrument pilot training, biannual flight reviews, and instrument proficiency checks. With a 100% pass rate for new pilots, Hilton Head Flyers is dedicated to helping you achieve your aviation dreams. Call us today to start your journey.
services:
